name: AVAssetReaderTrackOutput
desc: An object that reads media data from a single track of an asset.

items.name: init(track: AVAssetTrack, outputSettings: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates an object that reads media data from an asset track.

items.name: var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: The processing algorithm to use for scaled audio edits.

items.name: var outputSettings: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The output settings for this track output.

items.name: var track: AVAssetTrack
items.desc: The track from which the output reads sample buffers.
